MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH5 postcode area of Connahs Quay, affecting properties in Princes Street and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 7:49 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at  12:05 pm on 22nd January, 2021.
